name: Explosive Charge
Lore: 'Standard explosive charge carried by Rebel commandos. When used in multiple, these charges have the explosive capacity to level a heavily armored structure.',
Text: 'Deploy on an interior site you occupy. Immune to Overload. Place in Used Pile if opponent controls this site. If you just lost a battle opponent initiated here, may draw destiny. All cards (except Effects) here are lost if destiny > 4 (otherwise, Charge lost).',
